title: Rainy night city street driving with moderate speed and occasional braking.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. The driver is cautious and attentive to the surroundings, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic and weather conditions.
